lead_paragraph: Four months after an investigation found systemic doping in Russian track and field, the World Anti-Doping Agency’s president, Craig Reedie, said he would “reanalyze” the report to see if new inquiries were needed.
snippet: Four months after an investigation found systemic doping in Russian track and field, the World Anti-Doping Agency’s president, Craig Reedie, said he would “reanalyze” the report to see if new inquiries were needed.
